properties.title: Capanna Cadagno
properties.description: Capanna Cadagno was built in 1934 and completely renovated in 2013. It is owned by the Ritom section of the Societ√† Alpinistica Ticinese (SAT). The cabin is an ideal starting point for hiking, nature watching and biking and very popular among school classes, families and groups. Moreover, it is known for its high-quality cuisine. Hot meals are available the whole day.
